name: Back To Life (itch) (Gaming M)
description:
I just finished the GameDev.tv 2D course a few days before the Jam and wanted to get something out there. Most of the features are based on the Tilevania section. 

Assets:

Soul Fragment Pickup Sound Effect: https://opengameart.org/content/512-sound-effects-8-bit-style

Background Music: https://opengameart.org/content/i-swear-i-saw-it-background-track

Arrow & Ghost are made by: https://www.pixilart.com/lavenderpixel

The rest of the assets were made by me.
